name: Holi
shortDescription: An open-source library of colors, gradients and utils built using Jetpack Compose for Android. Has around 450 colors to choose from including material colors, standard HTML colors and, a custom gradient mixer for easy gradient building.
longDescription: An open-source library of colors, gradients and utils built using Jetpack Compose for Android. Has around 450 colors to choose from including material colors, standard HTML colors and, a custom gradient mixer for easy gradient building.
